title: Southern Tropic
description1: A looping 3D animation for the Pinthouse Pizza can release of Southern Tropic IPA.

title: Emilio
description1: A 3D animation for the Pinthouse Pizza can release of Emilio - a hazy triple IPA brewed in collaboration with Green Cheek Beer Co.

title: Rattlesnake Arms
description1: A 3D animation for the Pinthouse Pizza can release of Rattlesnake Arms, a triple IPA brewed in collaboration with Noble Ale Works.

title: Sacred Delicacies
description1: A 3D animation for the Pinthouse Pizza can release of Sacred Delicacies, a dry-hopped pilsner brewed in collaboration with Burial Beer Co.

title: Electric Jellyfish
description1: A 3D animation for the can release of Pinthouse Pizza's flagship IPA, Electric Jellyfish.

title: Crispy Waves
description1: A 3D animation for the first Pinthouse Pizza can release - Crispy Waves hazy IPA.
description2: I designed the underwater set in the 3D and sampled some of the coral elements and fish from the can itself to use in the scene. I then created the bubbles using Particular and composited the shot in After Effects.

title: 3D Branding Spot
description1: A 3D branding spot for the Austin production and post company, Cut To Black.
description2: I worked with the company owner, Lee Rothenflue, to conceptualize a number of short 3D animations that allude to the Cut To Black brand. I then modeled (some of the models were purchased), textured, lit, and animated all of the shots in Cinema 4D and rendered them using Octane Render.

title: 2018 Gaming Awards Intro Video
description1: This video was produced by Cut To Black for the 2018 SXSW Gaming Awards.
description2: I did all of the visual effects work for this video, which includes 3D camera tracking, rotoscoping, and compositing.

title: Texas Cotton - VFX Cutdown
description1: This is a cutdown showcasing the visual effects work I did for the 2018 short film, Texas Cotton.
description2: I did the muzzle flashes, bullet hits, and practical explosion enhancement. I also designed and animated the end credit sequence.
description3: This short film is not available to watch because Texas Cotton was later made into a feature film.

title: Shilo - VFX Cutdown
description1: This is a cutdown showcasing the visual effects work I did for the 2018 short film, Shilo.
description2: In the first sequence, I composited in the television screen, and added the screen reflection in the actor's eye. The jeep sequence was all filmed on green screen. I did all of the keying and compositing of the background plate.

title: Warm Feet - VFX Breakdown
description1: This is a process breakdown of a visual effects shot that I did for the 2017 short film, Warm Feet.
description2: I tracked the two tissue boxes by hand in Cinema 4D, and generated the smoke using TurbulenceFD. I rotoscoped her legs and composited the shot in After Effects.

title: Logo Animation
description1: A logo animation showcasing the different services provided by the Austin production and post company, Cut To Black.
